mean_cn: n. 分隔间，火车车厢的分隔间
mean_en: one of the separate sections which a coach/car on a train is divided into; one of the separate sections that something such as a piece of furniture or equipment has for keeping things in
sentence: The four compartments contain four different candies.
sentence_trans: 四个隔间装了四种不同的糖果。
word_etyma: compart分开 + ment 表示行为、行为的过程或结果 → 共同空间被分隔开 → compartment（火车车厢中的）隔间
